Clients.OnLineTool
Class ServerClient

java.lang.Object
  org.omg.PortableServer.Servant
      alma.exec.OperatorClientPOA
          alma.exec.operatorbase.client.teamwork.auxiliary.OperatorClientAdapter
              alma.exec.operatorbase.client.teamwork.auxiliary.OperatorClientImpl
                  Clients.OnLineTool.ServerClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
alma.ACS.OffShootOperations, alma.exec.InfoReceiverIFOperations, alma.exec.OperatorClientOperations, alma.exec.Scheduling_to_OperatorOperations, org.omg.CORBA.portable.InvokeHandler, si.ijs.maci.ClientOperations
public class ServerClient
extends alma.exec.operatorbase.client.teamwork.auxiliary.OperatorClientImpl

This class is a listener of opserver, so the opserver send information to this listener and the listener save the information on the corresponding HashMap, is there is not new information, then the status to display is the same of the last iteration

Author:
mschilling, Andres Villalobos, 2011 Summerjob, Ingenieria de ejecucion en Computacion e Informatica, Universidad Catolica del norte
See Also:
The project Twiki page and my Dailylog please Contact to a.e.v.r.007@gmail.com

ServerClient

public ServerClient(java.lang.String clientName)
This is the constructor of ServerClient, and just receive the name that will identify this client. On the constructor all the HashMaps has been initialized and are ready to be used.

receiveActiveContainers

public void receiveActiveContainers(alma.exec.NameStruct[] structs,
                                    alma.exec.ReceiveType type)
This method receive the infomation from opserver related to containers status. The opserver send information about active containers so when a container down, then doesnt receive information about this container, so to can show when a container is down, you must to store the pass status of all containers and if the new information contains less information, then the containers that on the past interations exist and now no is a fall container.

Specified by:
receiveActiveContainers in interface alma.exec.InfoReceiverIFOperations
Overrides:
receiveActiveContainers in class alma.exec.operatorbase.client.teamwork.auxiliary.OperatorClientImpl
Parameters:
structs - Contains the containers status sent from opserver

generateReport

private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> generateReport(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> status)
This method generate a report from a specific HashMap, so each of the HashMaps representing ACSStatus, AlmaStatus, AntennaStatus, ContainerStatus and SubsystemStatus can be passed as a parameter and will return a linkedlist of Status on json format.

Parameters:
status - A hashmap wich status information
Returns:
A linked list with strings representing information on json format

getStatusList

public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getStatusList(java.lang.String NameOfStatus)
This method recieve as parameter the name of the system to monitor and return a linked list with this information

Parameters:
NameOfStatus - Ths kind of status that you need
Returns:
A linked list with the needed information

getAntennaStatus

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAntennaStatus()
This method return the entire information of antenna received by this listener

Returns:
A hashmap with the antenna information, the key of this hashmap is equal to the name o the antenna and the value have the status on json format

CleanAllInformation

public void CleanAllInformation()
This method clear all the hashmaps
